Text: If you like this anime tell me and I will upload the other episodes, a few at a time.

Hi Naala, first I would like to thank you for uploading this video. I do love this anime and I hope you could upload the rest of the episodes (asap) hahaha. This was aired in THE PHILIPPINES 3 years ago but I wasn't able to watch the whole story so I hope you could do a big favor for me and for someone else who loved this. Thanks in advance !!!
Hi Dear Naala. Thanks a million for giving us the chance to have this masterpiece. Just we need more seeders, otherwise we cannot download it at all. Best wishes, Sakura

I'm really glad to find this because I've been looking for it for awhile.
But there aren't enough seeders. or any right now. It's stuck at 93% with no complete files.
